# Harrison Yongjoon Youn {.custom-name}

::: {.custom-subtitle}
Economics PhD Candidate<br>
The Ohio State University

<div class="contact-simple">
My research spans labor and health economics and the economics of AI and innovation.

Using data and causal inference, I study how the labor market and the healthcare system interact, shaping incentives, employer and employee behavior, and the distribution of frictions, benefits, and costs.

I also study how AI and scientific knowledge spillover shape human capital and labor market outcomes.

Previously, I was a Research Associate at the National University of Singapore (NUS).
